Talk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>It may be the middle of the day, but
I can't say it seems safe to go in there
alone, if that's what you were thinking.
Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You thinking about going in there alone?
Sure, <clr:0000>you'll be harder to spot in the rain<clr:ffff>,
but I'm still not sure it's a good idea.
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>We have to train. We have to get stronger.
We have to get ready for what's next.

The plan is to head northwest to the
<clr:0000>South Tabantha Snowfield <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>.
Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're thinking about heading in there
alone, I can't say I'd advise it. It won't
be long before it's dark, you know.
Talk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm not sure it's wise to venture over
there in this <clr:0000>thunderstorm<clr:ffff>. Hey, you're
not wearing <clr:0000>metal <clr:ffff>equipment, are you?!
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_00>First, we have to treat the wounded.<sp:5:1:0>
Then, as soon as everyone's OK, we'll
get together and plan our next move.
Common_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Stop right there! You can't just walk up
to my squad and start jabbering at them
like that!
Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Our attacks can't reach 'em from here.
Ugh, if only something could be done
about that <clr:0000>collapsed bridge<clr:ffff>!
Talk_020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Just make sure you take off any <clr:0000>metal
equipment<clr:ffff> first! Help us out and there's
a nice <clr:0000>reward<clr:ffff> in it for you!
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Bring it on, creeps! You're about to
regret you ever laid eyes on us!
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You have to be rewarded. Do you have
a minute?
Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>We have to get across the broken bridge
if we're going to board that ship.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

If we could just <clr:0000>fix the bridge<clr:ffff>, we'd clean
up those monsters for good.
Talk_021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We can't afford to waste time here!
If you help us out, there's a <clr:0000>reward<clr:ffff>
in it for you!
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That thing you've got there...<sp:5:0:0> That's the
<clr:0000>Master Sword<clr:ffff>, isn't it?

I hear it's an incredible weapon.
Legendary even! <sp:5:1:0>I guess it's no
wonder you're so strong.
Never thought I'd get the chance to
lay eyes on it myself.
Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>As always, I'm totally awed by your
incredible stren—<sp:5:0:0> Huh?

<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>That thing you've got there...<sp:5:0:0> That's the
<clr:0000>Master Sword<clr:ffff>, isn't it?

I hear it's an amazing sword. A legendary
sword, actually! <sp:5:1:0>No wonder you're
so strong!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Never thought I'd get a chance to lay
eyes on it myself. <sp:5:1:0>Thanks for giving me
that chance.
Talk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now's our chance! The monsters are
groggy! Help us out and there's a nice
<clr:0000>reward <clr:ffff>in it for you.
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>I'm not gonna lie, I'm terrified of fighting
these monsters. But all I have to do is
remember my training, right?
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>You really surprised me. Taking care of
the bridge is one thing, but your power
on the battlefield is awe-inspiring!
Talk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We can't just let these monsters go and
walk all over everyone! Help us out and
there's a nice <clr:0000>reward <clr:ffff>in it for you!
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Captain Flaxel says we should wipe out
every last monster.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, it's you! What an honor to run
into you again.
Talk_018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>My forces need some rest, you know?
But look, if you help us out, we'll make
sure you're well <clr:0000>rewarded<clr:ffff>.
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Angry>You monsters have no idea what you're
in for! That's right, you're about to see
the mighty Flaxel squad in action!
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>My fists of justice are gonna pound some
peace back into this world!
Talk_019:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now's our chance! The <clr:0000>rain makes it
harder to hear our footsteps<clr:ffff>. Help us out
and there's a nice <clr:0000>reward<clr:ffff> in it for you!
Talk1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>We're in the middle of a battle! Like
I said, this isn't the place for casual
chitchat, OK?
Talk1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Didn't someone once say that trembling is
just a sign of excitement? I can do this.
I can do this. I can do this.
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>As usual, I'm in awe of that incredible
strength of yours.
Talk1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughL>I warn you, voe, you are sure to be
quite envious of how I handle a spear
in battle.
Talk1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Angry>What do you want? We're in the middle of
an important mission right now.
Talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>I guess we don't have what it takes.
Beaten at our own game...<sp:5:0:0> Talk about
a pathetic monster-control crew.
Look, if I go down, not only will the whole
squad be knocked out...<sp:5:0:0>I won't be able to
treat anyone's wounds.
So I'm pretty much stuck here.


<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>You're the only one I trust enough to
ask this of...<sp:5:1:0> Please, can you take out
those monsters for me?
Talk1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry>I'm gonna get rid of every last stinkin'
monster there is!
Talk1051:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Sorry, but this really isn't a good time
for chitchat.
Talk1039: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>These fists are 'bout to start a fire!
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The monsters we defeated in the
<clr:0000>South Tabantha Snowfield <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>
to the northwest...
I think they've come back because of the
<clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff> too.

We've gotta do some serious training
so they can't turn the tables on us.

You be careful out there too, OK? Don't
be reckless. Your life is worth looking out
for, you got that?
Talk1052:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>I've got to focus on the battle, so
no talkin'.
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble_00>As you can see, the monsters are back
and strong as ever all because of the
<clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
But<sp:5:0:0> with the bridge fixed,<sp:5:1:0> we'll be putting
an end to their fun.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>You should join us. It'll give everyone just
the monster-battling boost they need.
Talk1053: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Huh? So you're gonna join the fight too?
Talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Trouble_00>Look at that... The monsters have come
back good as new, all because of the
<clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>.
And this time...<sp:5:1:0>they've beaten us.


If I get taken out, there'll be no one left to
treat the wounded. And that would be an
even worse defeat.
<snd:TalkDeny_01>I hate to ask, but...can you help us again?<sp:5:1:0>
Please, <sp:5:0:0>go,<sp:5:0:0> destroy those monsters!
Talk1054:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Preparation is everything. It is how a
battle is truly won.
Talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If we happen to cross paths in the future,
I hope you'll consider fighting alongside
us again.
Talk1055: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>I am waiting for the right moment.
Talk1061:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:LaughL_01>Haha, whoa!<sp:5:1:0> You're saying you defeated
the monsters all by yourself AGAIN?!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Your strength is unbelievable. Surprises
me every time!
Talk1049:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01><sp:1:3:4:6e000000>May the Goddess Hylia keep you safe,
brave warrior!
Talk1056:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>We were gonna take out a bunch of
monsters, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh_01>Now that we're here, they're...gone.
All of 'em.
Talk1057:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If we happen to meet again, consider
fighting beside us, OK?
Talk1070:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Do you need something right now?<sp:5:1:0> If so,
you should go talk to the captain.
Talk1058:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Happy_01>Haha!<sp:5:1:0> So you're saying that you defeated
the monsters all by yourself?!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>With someone as strong as you around,
who needs a monster-control crew?
Talk1064:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_00>It was a hard-fought battle, but thanks
to Link, we did it! We won!

First, we have to treat the wounded.
Then, when everyone's ready, we'll
start planning our next moves.
Talk1071:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>You're gonna get an earful from
the captain if she finds you just
loitering around.
Talk1065:
As for you, Link,<sp:5:1:0> you deserve a reward.


Can we talk?
Talk1066:
As for you, Link, <sp:5:1:0>you deserve thanks.


Can I talk to you for a minute?
Talk1067:
<snd:Notice_00>As for you, Link,<sp:5:1:0> you came back!<sp:0:4:0>I won't let you walk away empty-handed.<sp:5:1:0>
Can we talk?
Talk1068:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble_00>As you can see, the monsters are back
and strong as ever, all because of the
<clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
Still,<sp:5:0:0> the bridge has been repaired,<sp:5:1:0> so
their fun is about to come to an end.

<snd:LaughS_01>My squad is gonna rush that ship as soon
as I see an opening. Those monsters will
wish they never came back!
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>You should join us. It'll give everyone just
the monster-battling boost they need.
Talk1007_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_00>Not only did it look like you were taking
on all the monsters by yourself but you
even came and fixed the bridge for us!
<snd:LaughL_00>We can't keep letting you have all the fun.<sp:5:1:0>
We'll back you up from here on out!
PosterMessage:
Headed <clr:0000>west to the Menoat River <clr:ffff>to fight
monsters on a ship there. -Captain Flaxel,
Monster-Control Crew, Squad Three
Near1006: If we can just get aboard!
Talk1026_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>I can't believe how generous you are!<sp:5:1:0>
You helped us out again. Just...out of
the kindness of your heart?
Talk1004:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>OK, you lot!<sp:5:0:0> Are you ready?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>On our honor as members of the
monster-control crew, we will take down
every last one of those fiends!
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>I'd prefer it if you didn't try to strike up
a random conversation with me in the
middle of battle.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If the whole squad falls and I fall
with them...

I won't be able to treat anyone's wounds,
you see? <sp:5:0:0>So I have to stay put.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>You're the only one I can ask this of...<sp:5:1:0>
Please, can you help take out those
monsters for me?
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:LaughL>My spear technique is worth observing.
Forged in Gerudo, it is a thing of beauty.
Voe are always quite impressed.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_00>You did! You fixed the bridge for us!
Incredible!

I can't thank you enough. I guess the rest
is up to us now.
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Did you ever surprise me! There we were,
totally flummoxed by the collapsed bridge.

Then you come swooping in and wipe out
every last monster. All by yourself too!
Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're thinking about heading in there
alone in the dead of night... Yeah, I'm
not sure that sounds like a good idea.
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Hm? <sp:5:1:0>Oh, hey, I thought I recognized
you from somewhere.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Aren't you that missing swordsman?<sp:0:4:0>You're all anyone at Lookout Landing
talked about when I was there.<sp:5:1:0> Ah, but
you seem good. Happy to see it!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkDeny_01>Anyway, this is the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>.
We help keep the peace in Hyrule by
taking out as many monsters as we can.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>I'm Flaxel, <sp:5:1:0>captain of squad three. It's real
nice to meet you.
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm?<sp:5:1:0> Oh hey, I thought I recognized you
from somewhere!

Don't you remember me?<sp:5:0:0> Come on!<sp:5:0:0> We
chatted back at Lookout Landing.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Anyway, let me introduce myself again...<sp:5:0:0>
I'm the captain of squad three of the
monster-control crew.
Name's Flaxel.<sp:5:0:0> Nice to meet you.
Near1025: As many times as it takes.
Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>No matter how groggy those monsters
might be this morning, I'm not sure it's
a good idea to head in there alone.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>We were just on our way to rough up
those monsters over there.

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>But the bridge to the ship collapsed,
so we don't have a way to board it.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>We can give those monsters a real
whoopin' if we can just <clr:0000>get that
bridge fixed<clr:ffff>.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>I won't be holding anything back!
Yeah, that's right, you monsters have
been warned!
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, hey. I've still got to give you
your reward.
